txt.en: You have recovered a bucket full of crabs from the Corsair.\n\nYou should give it to Avri at Sadrech's Camp.
With her hands full tending to her mother's injuries, Avri finds herself unable to check on her crab traps.
Talk to Avri at Sadrech's Camp
'I'd hoped to check on my crab traps, but I can't do that now, not with Mother injured.\n\n'Would you check on them for me? I set out five along the beach at Lithengris to the south-east.'
'A Corsair had stolen my crabs?! Then I shall count myself lucky that I did not go to Lithengris myself! Thank you.'
Avri has asked you to check the crab traps she placed at Lithengris.\n\nLithengris is located south-east of Sadrech's Camp.
None of the crab traps held any crabs.\n\nYou should check the last crab trap at Lithengris.
